amendment.description: At the end of the bill (before the short title), insert the following: SEC. ___. None of the funds made available by this Act may be used to implement a proposed rule for turtle excluder devices as described in the Southeast Fishery Bulletin published by the National Oceanic and Atmospheric Administration on May 8, 2012.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to prohibit the use of funds to be used to implement a proposed rule for turtle excluder devices as described in the Southeast Fishery Bulletin published by the National Oceanic and Atmospheric Administration on May 8, 2012.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Landry amendment (A047) Agreed to by recorded vote: 218 - 201 (Roll no. 236).

action.text: Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
Roll call votes on amendments in House
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Landry amendment (A047) Agreed to by recorded vote: 218 - 201 (Roll no. 236).
House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A047) offered by Mr. Landry.
